content:
TITLE: Applying the Theme - JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows how to apply the tailwindcss-3 theme to a Select2 element.  It requires jQuery and Select2 to be already initialized.
SOURCE: https://github.com/erimicel/select2-tailwindcss-theme/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
$('select').select2({
  theme: 'tailwindcss-3',
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring TailwindCSS Content - JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to update the Tailwind CSS configuration file to include the select2-tailwindcss-theme CSS files in the content array. This ensures that Tailwind recognizes and processes the theme's styles.
SOURCE: https://github.com/erimicel/select2-tailwindcss-theme/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
// tailwind.config.js
module.exports = {
  content: [
    './src/**/*.{html,js}',
    './node_modules/select2-tailwindcss-theme/dist/*.css', // Include the package
  ],
  theme: {
    extend: {},
  },
  plugins: [],
};
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including CSS via CDN - HTML
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to include the select2-tailwindcss-theme CSS file using a CDN. It provides examples for both the latest version and specifying a specific version.
SOURCE: https://github.com/erimicel/select2-tailwindcss-theme/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: HTML
CODE:
```
<!-- Latest -->
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/erimicel/select2-tailwindcss-theme/dist/select2-tailwindcss-theme-plain.min.css">

<!-- Different version change (x.x.x) -->
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/erimicel/select2-tailwindcss-theme@x.x.x/dist/select2-tailwindcss-theme-plain.min.css">
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Enabling Dark Mode - JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to enable dark mode in Tailwind CSS by setting the darkMode property to 'selector'. This allows toggling dark mode using the 'dark' class.
SOURCE: https://github.com/erimicel/select2-tailwindcss-theme/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
// tailwind.config.js
module.exports = {
  // The selector strategy replaced the class strategy in Tailwind CSS v3.4.1.
  darkMode: 'selector',
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Importing the CSS - JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to import the CSS file for the select2-tailwindcss-theme in a JavaScript file. It demonstrates importing both the regular and minified versions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/erimicel/select2-tailwindcss-theme/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: JavaScript
CODE:
```
import 'select2-tailwindcss-theme/dist/select2-tailwindcss-theme.css'; // Regular version
// OR
import 'select2-tailwindcss-theme/dist/select2-tailwindcss-theme.min.css'; // Minified version
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing the Package - Bash
DESCRIPTION: These commands demonstrate how to install the select2-tailwindcss-theme package using npm and yarn. They are prerequisites for using the theme in a project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/erimicel/select2-tailwindcss-theme/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: Bash
CODE:
```
# npm
$ npm install select2-tailwindcss-theme

# yarn
$ yarn add select2-tailwindcss-theme
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building CSS - Bash
DESCRIPTION: This command demonstrates how to build the CSS files for the select2-tailwindcss-theme after modifying the SCSS files. This also updates the demo.
SOURCE: https://github.com/erimicel/select2-tailwindcss-theme/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: Bash
CODE:
```
npm run build:all   # Build all files and update demo as-well
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Development Setup - Bash
DESCRIPTION: These commands describe the steps to set up the development environment for the select2-tailwindcss-theme.  This includes cloning the repository, navigating to the project directory, and installing dependencies.
SOURCE: https://github.com/erimicel/select2-tailwindcss-theme/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: Bash
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/erimicel/select2-tailwindcss-theme.git
cd select2-tailwindcss-theme
npm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Contributing Changes - Bash
DESCRIPTION: These commands illustrate the steps to contribute changes to the select2-tailwindcss-theme project. This includes creating a feature branch, committing changes, pushing the branch, and opening a pull request.
SOURCE: https://github.com/erimicel/select2-tailwindcss-theme/blob/main/README.md#_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: Bash
CODE:
```
git checkout -b feature-branch-name
git commit -m 'Add some feature'
git push origin feature-branch-name
```
